overview: Director Mahmoud Salem needs a new face to introduce to his audiences. One day he finds his star, Mona. Offering her the opportunity to be a star, she asks for a chance to ask her fiancé about it. Mahmoud and Mona start to work together and fall for each other. Mona's  fiancé feels the vibe coming from them and he leaves her.
title: Hobi Al Awal Wa Al Akhir
